methodology.description: Each plugin is run in isolation against identical fixture files containing known-problematic and known-clean code patterns. Violations are mapped to exported functions to calculate True Positives (correctly detected anti-patterns), False Negatives (missed anti-patterns), False Positives (clean code incorrectly flagged), and True Negatives (clean code correctly passed).

expectedDetections.prob_silent_catch: Empty catch block / silent error swallowing
expectedDetections.prob_string_concat: String concatenation instead of template literals
expectedDetections.prob_api_in_utils: External API call in utility function
expectedDetections.prob_arguments_usage: Using arguments object instead of rest params
expectedDetections.prob_for_in_array: Using for...in on array instead of for...of
expectedDetections.prob_promise_race_leak: Promise.race without cleanup of losing promises
